text: Eric Hänni (19 December 1938 – 25 December 2024) was a Swiss judoka. He competed between 1959 and 1974. In 1964, he won an Olympic silver medal. During his career Hänni won seven individual national titles (1959, 1962, 1964, 1965, 1969–71). He took part in twelve European and three World Championships. Hänni was born in Delémont, Switzerland. Hänni died on 25 December 2024, six days after his 86th birthday.Addio a Eric Hänni, medaglia d’argento nel judo alle Olimpiadi del 1964 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Switzerland Category:Judoka Category:People from the canton of Jura
title: Eric Hänni
